message:
Hello Everybody,
Recently I have my Github account flagged and hidden from the public. I don't know why. My usage is very straightforward. 
What do you think why this could happen?
thanks

data.message: Surprisingly I am not flagged now :) and my account is public again. What a strange thing !! . What I did,  I send a complain, But I don't think they opened it. Then I removed my github site repo. I don't know whether the contents were violating anything  and Is this the main reason of the flag?

Reply from Github
Hello there Ehab,

I'm sorry about our misbehaving spam-detecting robots - they do a good job but can be a bit overzealous at times. I've just unflagged your account and made your profile public again, you are all set!

Please don't hesitate to ask if you have any questions.

Thanks,
Change your password as may be your account used by a spammer to degrade performance of the servers
